com.splunk.logging

Class SplunkLogEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.splunk.logging.SplunkLogEventFactory

  • public abstract class SplunkLogEventFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory class that allows you to set SplunkLogEvent templates and generate clones. Useful for reuse when you log many events with the same key=value pair signatures. SplunkLogEvent eventTemplate = new SplunkLogEvent("Login Event","foo"); SplunkLogEventFactory.addTemplate("foo", eventTemplate); SplunkLogEvent event = SplunkLogEventFactory.getInstanceFromTemplate("foo"); event.addPair("someparam", "helloworld");
    Author:
    Damien Dallimore damien@baboonbones.com
